alert.note: Alert for Alamance; Anson; Chatham; Guilford; Lee; Montgomery; Moore; Orange; Randolph; Richmond (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 26 at 2:44PM EDT until April 26 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT FOR ALAMANCE...MOORE...WESTERN ORANGE...EAST CENTRAL ANSON...EASTERN MONTGOMERY...NORTHERN RICHMOND...EASTERN RANDOLPH...SOUTHEASTERN GUILFORD...WEST CENTRAL LEE AND WESTERN CHATHAM COUNTIES... At 243 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Burlington to 6 miles east of North Carolina Zoo to 11 miles southeast of Biscoe, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Burlington and Elon around 250 PM EDT. Graham around 250 PM EDT. Mebane around 255 PM EDT. Siler City and Pinehurst around 300 PM EDT. Southern Pines around 305 PM EDT. Carthage around 310 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Franklinville, Snow Camp, Pinebluff, Alamance and Candor. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Alamance; Anson; Chatham; Guilford; Lee; Montgomery; Moore; Orange; Randolph; Richmond
